text: One of your clerks makes a discovery and mentions it to his direct superior, the information is passed through the ranks until it eventually reaches your desk. On the outskirts of a small village within your domain, a crafstman of unpeered skill and technique resides in a humble workshop. Even with his meagre resources and tools, this artisan is said to be capable of creating works of great wonder. Through great effort, you manage to seek out this man, and have your riders escort him to you for a personal audience. After swaying the crafter with gifts of wine, meat and jade, he is convinced to move to a new workshop within your city, where he will continue to create his great works - exclusively for your own collection.
